data.comment: Today's referee, Armando Villarreal, has blown to start the match.
Free kick for New England in the half of New York City.
In the minute 2, New England have been awarded a corner by Armando Villarreal.
Throw-in for New England in the half of New York City.
New York City awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 4, Free kick for New York City in their own half.
Ball safe as New England is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Alexander Ring of New York City is pulled up for offside.
In the minute 10, New York City's Anton Tinnerholm gets in a shot but it is blocked by a New England defender.
Corner awarded to New York City.
New York City have been awarded a corner by Armando Villarreal.
In the minute 14, Corner awarded to New York City.
New York City push forward at Gillette Stadium and Maxime Chanot gets in a great header. The attempt is cleared by the New England defence.
Corner awarded to New York City.
In the minute 15, Armando Villarreal awards the home team a throw-in.
New York City have been awarded a corner by Armando Villarreal.
New York City's Keaton Parks attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
In the minute 17, Armando Villarreal signals a free kick to New England in their own half.
Can New England get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in New York City's half?
Free kick for New England in their own half.
In the minute 19, Throw-in New England.
Armando Villarreal signals a New England throw-in in New York City's half.
Free kick in a good position for New England!
In the minute 21, Gustavo Bou (New England) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In Foxborough New England attack through Gustavo Bou. The finish is off target, however.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Foxborough.
In the minute 22, Armando Villarreal signals a free kick to New York City in their own half.
New York City awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Armando Villarreal awards New England a goal kick.
In the minute 25, Free kick New York City.
Throw-in for New England in their own half.
Throw-in for New York City at Gillette Stadium.
In the minute 26, New England have a goal kick.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
New York City awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 29, Goal kick for New York City at Gillette Stadium.
New England push forward at Gillette Stadium and Teal Bunbury gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined New York City defence.
New England have been awarded a corner by Armando Villarreal.
In the minute 31, New England's Cristian Penilla gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Ball goes out of play for a New York City goal kick.
Corner awarded to New York City.
In the minute 33, New York City to take a throw-in in New England territory.
Armando Villarreal signals a free kick to New England.
New York City's Keaton Parks has been booked in Foxborough.
In the minute 34, Cristian Penilla (New England) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
New York City have a dangerous throw-in.
New York City's Heber gets in a shot on goal at Gillette Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 35, Corner awarded to New York City.
Ball goes out of play for a New England goal kick.
Keaton Parks for New York City gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 36, It's a goal kick for the home team in Foxborough.
Throw-in New York City.
Armando Villarreal signals a New England throw-in in New York City's half.
In the minute 38, Throw-in for New England close to the penalty box.
New England have a goal kick.
New York City awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 40, Teal Bunbury for New England has been booked by Armando Villarreal and receives a first yellow card.
Throw-in for New York City in the half of New England.
New York City awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 42, Armando Villarreal awards the home team a throw-in.
New York City have been awarded a corner by Armando Villarreal.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 45, The first-half has come to a close in Foxborough.
The second half has started at Gillette Stadium.
In Foxborough a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Alex Buttner is replacing Matt Polster for the home team.
In the minute 46, Diego Fagundez is replacing DeJuan Jones for New England at Gillette Stadium.
Corner awarded to New England.
In the minute 47, Can New England get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in New York City's half?
New England to take a throw-in in New York City territory.
Free kick for New York City in their own half.
In the minute 49, Throw-in for New England at Gillette Stadium.
Goal kick for New England at Gillette Stadium.
Throw-in for New York City in their own half.
In the minute 52, Armando Villarreal signals a free kick to New York City in their own half.
New York City are caught offside.
New York City's Ronald Matarrita breaks free at Gillette Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 53, Armando Villarreal awards New England a goal kick.
Throw-in for New England in the half of New York City.
In Foxborough New England's Teal Bunbury is caught offside.
In the minute 54, Armando Villarreal signals a free kick to New England.
New York City have been awarded a corner by Armando Villarreal.
Anton Tinnerholm for New York City gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 56, Goal kick for New England at Gillette Stadium.
The home team replace Tommy McNamara with Tajon Buchanan.
Ball safe as New York City is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 57, New England awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Armando Villarreal signals a throw-in for New England, close to New York City's area.
Throw-in high up the field for New England in Foxborough.
In the minute 59, In Foxborough New York City attack through Heber. The finish is off target, however.
Armando Villarreal awards New England a goal kick.
Ball goes out of play for a New England goal kick.
In the minute 60, Own goal in Foxborough! Michael Mancienne scores in his own net to make it 0-1.
Free kick for New England in their own half.
Heber gets his shot on target but fails to score for New York City.
In the minute 64, Can New York City capitalize from this throw-in deep inside New England's half?
Ronny Deila (New York City) is making a first substitution, with Jesus Medina replacing Maxi Moralez.
New England needs to be cautious. New York City have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 65, Armando Villarreal signals a throw-in for New York City, close to New England's area.
Throw-in for New England at Gillette Stadium.
New England drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
In the minute 67, Bruce Arena is making the team's fourth substitution at Gillette Stadium with Kekuta Manneh replacing Brandon Bye.
New York City are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
Ball safe as New England is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 69, Free kick for New England in the half of New York City.
Corner awarded to New England.
In Foxborough New England drive forward through Gustavo Bou. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 70, New England have been awarded a corner by Armando Villarreal.
New York City have been awarded a corner by Armando Villarreal.
In the minute 72, Corner awarded to New York City.
The home team have replaced Teal Bunbury with Adam Buksa. This is the fifth substitution made today by Bruce Arena.
Heber heads in to give New York City a 0-2 lead at Gillette Stadium.
Ronald Matarrita with an assist there.
In the minute 73, The away team have replaced Heber with Alexandru Mitrita. This is the second substitution made today by Ronny Deila.
New York City make their third substitution with Valentin Castellanos replacing Gary Mackay Steven.
Throw-in for New York City in their own half.
In the minute 76, In Foxborough a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Kelyn Rowe (New England) has received a yellow card from Armando Villarreal.
Attention is being given to New York City’s James Sands and play has been suspended briefly.
In the minute 77, James Sands returns to the field for New York City after picking up a slight injury.
Can New England capitalize from this throw-in deep inside New York City's half?
Throw-in New York City.
In the minute 79, Corner awarded to New York City.
Keaton Parks (New York City) strikes at Gillette Stadium but his header is cleared.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Foxborough.
In the minute 82, New England have been awarded a corner by Armando Villarreal.
New York City awarded a free kick in their own half.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for New England close to the penalty box.
In the minute 84, At Gillette Stadium, Alexander Callens has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Corner awarded to New England.
New England drive upfield and Cristian Penilla gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a New York City defender.
In the minute 85, Can New England get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in New York City's half?
New York City have a goal kick.
Alexander Ring is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Important block from the New York City defence as Gustavo Bou fires in a strike for New England.
In the minute 87, Joe Scally is on a sub for Anton Tinnerholm for New York City.
James Sands, who was grimacing earlier, has been substituted. Nicolas Acevedo is the substitute for New York City.
In the minute 88, New England surge into the attack at Gillette Stadium but Adam Buksa’s header is off-target.
Goal kick for New York City at Gillette Stadium.
Alexander Ring for New York City is back on the field again.
In the minute 89, New England's Adam Buksa gets in a shot on goal at Gillette Stadium. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Gustavo Bou of New England gets in a strike, but is off target.
New York City have a goal kick.
Armando Villarreal awards the home team a throw-in.
Armando Villarreal signals a free kick to New England in their own half.
Ball safe as New York City is awarded a throw-in in their half.
The fourth official's board shows 5 minutes, which will be added to the 2nd half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Kelyn Rowe for New England drives towards goal at Gillette Stadium. But the finish is unsuccessful.
New England have been awarded a corner by Armando Villarreal.
Corner awarded to New England.
New York City to take a throw-in in New England territory.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 0-2.
